I have a DataFrame in pandas which I want to reverse in terms of column order. My DataFrame is defined like this:

```python
data = {'year': [2010, 2011, 2012, 2011, 2012, 2010, 2011, 2012],
    'team': ['Bears', 'Bears', 'Bears', 'Packers', 'Packers', 'Lions', 'Lions', 'Lions'],
    'wins': [11, 8, 10, 15, 11, 6, 10, 4],
    'losses': [5, 8, 6, 1, 5, 10, 6, 12]}
football = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=['year', 'team', 'wins', 'losses'])
```

The actual output is:

```python
   year     team  wins  losses
0  2010    Bears    11       5
1  2011    Bears     8       8
2  2012    Bears    10       6
3  2011  Packers    15       1
4  2012  Packers    11       5
5  2010    Lions     6      10
6  2011    Lions    10       6
7  2012    Lions     4      12
```

However, when I tried reversing the order using `football[::-1]`, it reversed the row order, not the column order. I also tried `football.columns = football.columns[::-1]`, but it only reversed the column labels and not the entire column itself. How can I reverse the order of columns, not the rows or labels?

To reverse the order of columns in a Pandas DataFrame, you can use the `.iloc` accessor to select all rows and reverse the order of columns. Here's how you can do it:

```python
import pandas as pd

data = {
    'year': [2010, 2011, 2012, 2011, 2012, 2010, 2011, 2012],
    'team': ['Bears', 'Bears', 'Bears', 'Packers', 'Packers', 'Lions', 'Lions', 'Lions'],
    'wins': [11, 8, 10, 15, 11, 6, 10, 4],
    'losses': [5, 8, 6, 1, 5, 10, 6, 12]
}
football = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=['year', 'team', 'wins', 'losses'])

# Reverse the order of columns
football_reversed = football.iloc[:, ::-1]

print(football_reversed)
```

This will output the DataFrame with the column order reversed:

```python
   losses  wins     team  year
0       5    11    Bears  2010
1       8     8    Bears  2011
2       6    10    Bears  2012
3       1    15  Packers  2011
4       5    11  Packers  2012
5      10     6    Lions  2010
6       6    10    Lions  2011
7      12     4    Lions  2012
```

This approach effectively reverses the order of the columns in the DataFrame, so you get the desired output.
